channel.title: Windows Web Application :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources .NET Forum from JitBit SQL Server 2017 Express Edition from Microsoft Video Transcript In this video, I’ll go through some of the basic steps to install a .NET web application on your server. For this example, I’ll be using a trial version of the JitBit .NET Forum software, as it is a good representative example of what it takes to deploy an existing .NET application to your server.
